JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Responsibilities:    Develops information systems by designing, developing, and installing software solutions.    Job Duties:       Determines operational feasibility by evaluating analysis, problem definition, requirements, solution development, and proposed solutions.     Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code.     Skills and Qualifications:    Analyzing Information , General Programming Skills, Software Design, Software Debugging, Software Documentation, Software Testing, Problem Solving, Teamwork, Software Development Fundamentals, Software Development Process, Software Requirements.
